duties.title: Know Your Incident Reponse Plan
duties.content:
Your Incident Response Plan is located on the CIPv5 SharePoint Site http://CIP. You will be notified by the Incident Response Team if you have a defined role in the Plan.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

  • Not knowing the location of the Plan
  • Not knowing your role on the Plan if you have a defined role.

duties.title: Respond to Incidents
duties.content:
When a potential incident is suspected, do the following:

  • Inform your leader
  • Leader shall contact via phone call David Boynton, Director of Information Security and Compliance.
  • If he's not available, leave a message for him to return your call immediately. DO NOT communicate the details of your concerns in a message.

DO NOT send an email with details of the concern.

duties.title: Test the Incident Response Plan
duties.content:
Your organization will perform an annual incident response test that will convene the Incident Response Team. In a test or real incident, you may be called on to aid the team, either as a full member, supporting member, or perhaps just to order pizza for them since they may be so busy they forget to eat.

POTENTIAL ISSUES

  • Not contributing to the Incident Response Team when asked.
  • Not getting the correct toppings on the pizza
